title: Why I can't set my club tag?
body:
I just had my own club and when i leave it, and joined another club, my club tag disapeared, i rejoined in that club but still, i cant put any club tag on me. Im in 3 clubs right now, but can not set the club tag to none. (sry for bad english)

My username: NEMEZEU, on EUNE

replies.body:
You need at least 5 people in your club before you can set a tag.

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/207994746-Guide-to-Clubs

It sounded weird that your tag was disappearing, so I took a look into this for you.  I wasn't able to find any issues here, though, and everything looks okay.  DTN also provided some good context for more information on tag requirements.  In the client, select the group icon on your chat bar (the center icon), and then the gear icon.  You will see a toggle option for Show Club Tags that you will need to enable to see your tag.  If you're still experiencing an issue please let me know!
